name: Search_Flights_Multi_Stops

legs.description:
The legs must contain the fromId, toId and date in object format and must be passed in an array.
EXAMPLE:
[
{
'fromId': 'BOM.AIRPORT',
'toId': 'AMD.AIRPORT',
'date': '2024-05-25'
},
…
]
Note: If there are multiple stops, there should be more leg objects in the array.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

response_summary:
There are currently 925 flight options available for your travel plans, with prices starting at $92.13 USD. The flights vary in terms of stops, with 225 being non-stop, 875 having one stop, and all 925 options allowing up to two stops. The cheapest flight is priced at $92.13, while the fastest option costs $113.90, and the best overall deal is $96.79. 

The main airlines operating these flights include IndiGo, Air India, and Air India Express. IndiGo offers the most flights (637) with the lowest starting price at $92.13, while Air India has 613 flights starting at $102.90, and Air India Express provides 13 flights beginning at $199.75. 

Flight departure times are spread throughout the day, with the majority departing between 6:00 AM and 11:59 AM, and arrivals also concentrated in the morning hours. Baggage policies are included, with most flights offering one checked bag (up to 33.1 lbs) and one cabin bag (up to 15.4 lbs with size restrictions). 

For example, one round-trip option includes a flight from Mumbai to Ahmedabad on May 25, 2025, departing at 1:00 AM and arriving at 2:20 AM, with a return flight on May 28, 2025, departing Ahmedabad at 11:45 PM and arriving in Mumbai at 1:15 AM the next day. This option costs $96.79, including taxes and fees, and includes baggage allowances as mentioned. 

You can filter and sort flights by price, duration, or airline preferences to find the best option for your needs.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers planning multi-stop flights. It searches flight options based on specified legs (departure, arrival, and dates), with sorting by best, cheapest, or fastest options. Users can filter by cabin class, passenger count, and age groups. The response includes flight details like price, duration, airline, baggage policies, and departure/arrival times. The legs parameter must include all segments of the journey.
